song.title: Bad Gal
song.lyrics:
Yo, Hey Roach, Mi love the gyal them eno.
Gyal if yuh too stush mi nuh like you
If you cyan mash ants mi nuh like you
You cyan defend yourself mi nuh like you
And me nuh love gyal weh easy fi frighten
Hey gyal fi tun up inna dance and
Whine up yuh body like yuh sure
Seh yuh body nah drop off
Gyal weh nuh fraid if a gyal diss
You or diss you friend something
Inna purse fi yuh pop off
Mi nuh like coward gyal, goody
Goody gyal outta style from '99
So when yuh see me inna the
Streets whether night or day is a
Bad gyal me wah fi find cause me love gyal weh.
Babababad no bloodclaat dem
Babababad no bloodclaat yow
Babababad no bloodclaat
Me nuh like gyal weh soft, and weak inna heart
Gyal fi babababad no bloodclat dem
Babababad no bloodclaat yow
Babababad no bloodclaat
Me nuh like gyal weh soft, and weak inna heart
Respect gyal never dare diss the
King, but real lioness yuh nuh
Fraid fi the king, and inna the bed
Yuh nuffi play with the thing
Me nuh want little gyal me nuh do baby sitting
You turbo chip in yuh nuffi slow me down
Ready fi the road when the road ready fi run
If a badness yuh nuh fraid fi hold
Me gun, and if mi itch with the
Fuck yuh just hold me down, cause you
Babababad no bloodclaat dem
Babababad no bloodclaat yow
Babababad no bloodclaat
Me nuh like gyal weh soft, and weak inna heart

If yuh too stush mi nuh like you
If you cyan mash ants mi nuh like you
If you cyan defend yourself mi nuh like you
And me nuh love gyal weh easy fi frighten
If yuh too stush mi nuh like you
If you cyan defend yourself mi nuh like you
If you cyan make me smile mi nuh like you
And me nuh love gyal weh easy fi frighten
Because mi love gyal weh
Babababad no bloodclaat dem
Babababad no bloodclaat yow
Babababad no bloodclaat
Me nuh like gyal weh soft, and weak inna heart
Babababad no bloodclaat dem
Babababad no bloodclaat yow

Whine up yuh body like yuh sure
Seh yuh body nah drop off
Gyal weh nuh fraid if a gyal diss
You or diss you friend something
Inna purse fi yuh pop off
Mi nuh like coward gyal, goody
Goody gyal outta style from '99
So when yuh see me inna the
Streets whether night or day is a
Bad gyal me wah fi find cause me love gyal weh.

vocabulary.explanation: A term for 'girl' or 'woman' in Jamaican Patois.
example_sentences: Di gyal dem a dance pon di floor.
Mi see a gyal weh mi like at di party.
Gyal fi know how fi enjoy demself.

vocabulary.explanation: Describes someone who is snobbish or stuck-up.
example_sentences: If yuh too stush, mi nuh like you.
She act stush, but she nice once yuh know her.
Mi nuh deal wid stush people.
If you cyan mash ants, mi nuh like you.
Mi cyan believe yuh do dat.
Yuh cyan come wid mi later?

vocabulary.explanation: An expression meaning to be able to handle small tasks or challenges.
example_sentences: If you cyan mash ants, mi nuh like you.
Him cyan even mash ants, much less do big tings.
Yuh haffi learn fi mash ants before yuh tackle big problems.
Gyal weh nuh fraid fi stand up fi demself.
Mi nuh fraid a nobody.
Yuh fraid fi try new tings?
If a gyal diss you, yuh haffi stand up.
Mi nuh like when people diss mi friend.
Him always a diss people fi no reason.
Gyal fi tun up inna dance.
Mi deh inna di house all day.
Yuh see mi inna di shop yesterday?

vocabulary.explanation: To turn up or increase in intensity, often used to describe dancing or music.
example_sentences: Gyal fi tun up inna dance.
Di music tun up loud last night.
Wi a go tun up di vibes at di party.

vocabulary.explanation: A type of dance involving gyrating the hips.
example_sentences: Whine up yuh body like yuh sure.
She love fi whine when di music play.
Di gyal dem a whine pon di dance floor.

vocabulary.explanation: To take out or reveal something, often used in a confrontational context.
example_sentences: Inna purse fi yuh pop off if necessary.
Him pop off di chain and give it to her.
She always ready fi pop off if trouble start.

vocabulary.explanation: A term for a well-behaved or proper girl, often used sarcastically.
example_sentences: Mi nuh like coward gyal, goody.
She act like a goody, but she wild.
Goody gyal outta style from '99.

vocabulary.explanation: A strong expletive in Jamaican Patois, often used for emphasis.
example_sentences: Babababad no bloodclaat dem.
Him vex and start cuss bloodclaat.
Mi cyaan believe di bloodclaat news.

vocabulary.explanation: Describes someone who is weak or easily intimidated.
example_sentences: Mi nuh like gyal weh soft.
Him too soft fi handle di pressure.
Yuh cyaan be soft inna dis world.

vocabulary.explanation: A confident, assertive woman who is not afraid to stand up for herself.
example_sentences: Is a bad gyal mi wah fi find.
She a real bad gyal, nuh mess wid her.
Bad gyal dem always know what dem want.

vocabulary.explanation: Prepared and eager to face challenges or go out.
example_sentences: Ready fi di road when di road ready fi run.
Mi always ready fi di road, no matter what.
Yuh ready fi di road tonight?
